title: Amazon Essentials Jeans for Men Straight Fit, Bootcut
description: STRAIGHT FIT DESIGN: These straight leg jeans for men are designed to fit comfortably through the hip and thigh, sitting at the waist
LIGHT-STRETCH COMFORT: Crafted from mid-weight cotton denim, these stretch jeans for men are made for all-day comfort
VINTAGE STYLE OPTIONS: Comes in indigo denim washes or solid colors with a garment wash for a lived in denim-inspired look

DURABLE DETAILS: Our jeans for men feature a zippered fly, metal button closure, bartack reinforcements, and riveted hand pocket. With stretch denim, it is always recommended to hang to dry for an extended garment life.
VERSATILE WARDROBE STAPLE: These straight fit jeans for men feature a five-pocket style, making them a dependable addition for business casual attire or everyday adventures

Our stretch fit jeans provide a flexible and comfortable wear, ideal for both casual outings and business casual events. Crafted with light-stretch denim, these men's stretch jeans offer ease of movement while maintaining a sleek appearance. Embrace the timeless appeal of straight fit jeans for men, which are fitted through the hip and thigh with a classic straight leg that sits at the waist. Available in versatile shades including black, these jeans for men are a must-have addition to any wardrobe
